Unit.label: Dates Function Unit
Unit.author: WebRatio s.r.l.

EnumProperty.Description:
The unit operation mode indicating the operation to be performed:
  • Add Days To Date(s): adds the specified number of days to the date(s).
  • Remove Days From Date(s): removes the specified number of days from the date(s).
  • Add Working Days To Date(s): adds the specified number of working days to the date(s).
  • Remove Working Days From Date(s): removes the specified number of working days from the date(s).
  • First Day Of Month(s): gets the first day of the month(s).
  • Last Day Of Month(s): gets the last day of the month(s).
  • First Day Of Year(s): gets the first day of the year(s).
  • Last Day Of Year(s): gets the last day of the year(s).
  • Start Day Timestamp(s): gets the start timestamp of the day(s).
  • End Day Timestamp(s): gets the end timestamp of the day(s).
  • From String(s) To Date(s): converts a string representing a date to a SQL date.
  • From Date(s) To String(s): converts a SQL date to a string, formatting it according to the specified pattern.

IntegerProperty.Description: The number of days to add or remove.

StringProperty.Description: The pattern to use for formatting the date.
